text: Christine de Bruin (née Bushie, born 3 March 1989) is a Canadian bobsledder. She competed in the two-woman event at the 2018 Winter Olympics with Melissa Lotholz. She won bronze in the women's event and a silver medal in the team relay at the 2019 Bobsled World Championships in Whistler, British Columbia. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian female bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Canada Category:Bobsledders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton
title: Christine de Bruin
